alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 26 at 11:31PM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Coffee and western Geneva Counties through 1215 AM CST... At 1131 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Glenwood to near Florala. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds near 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elba, Geneva, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Samson, New Brockton, Lee, Kinston, Coffee Springs, Mixons Crossroads, Curtis, Carl Folsom A/p, Central City, Logan Field Municipal A/P, Camp Humming Hills, Clintonville, Roeton, Camp Alaflo Bsa, Arcus and Enterprise Municipal A/P. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
